formattedAddress: 14 E 96th St APT 3, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 14 E 96th St APT 3, New York, NY 10128-0781, USA

originalText.text: Daniel was so kind as to give me some very affordable counseling regarding a questionable contract I received following a job offer recently. Even though the company ended up having understandable reasoning behind the concerning portions of the contract, my conversation with Daniel gave me enough pause to realize this was 100% not the opportunity for me. In fact, I feel like his counseling went beyond just the contract issues I had initially gone to him with; his candid advice was so extraordinarily and deeply appreciated. Fast forward a few weeks and I ended up taking a job I never would have considered, and yet I could not have possibly imagined a job that left me feeling so fulfilled. I cannot thank him enough for the profound effect he had on my life and my career path. I feel like I didn’t “loose time” because of all the incredibly valuable advice he gave me. Daniel had such a personal approach that was so deeply appreciated. I feel like he truly steered me in the right direction without either of us even knowing what that was!

originalText.text: I engaged Daniel to help me retrieve compensation for a ton of work I did for a startup that secured their funding, after which I was immediately fired and denied my fair share. Dan walked me through many different strategies and the pros/cons of each, and he kept in frequent touch both with updates from his side and to keep me engaged to push things along. Ultimately I recovered a good payout, and I will go to Daniel the next time I begin working with another startup to write some proper protections into my contract.

originalText.text: Dan was extremely helpful and informative, answering any and all questions I had in regards to my case (and I frequently had a lot). He took time to check-in, as well as give me frequent updates when they occurred,  and he made sure to lay out what to expect with each action that was taken. He was always supportive, and would consistently give his honest opinion in each situation, as well as the what to expect with theoretical ones.

originalText.text: Incredible experience from start to finish with Koval Law LLC. Dan Kovel   took on my case with professionalism, trustworthy, and patience. I highly recommend Koval Law firm to work on your next case. Successfully won my case. Thank you Dan Kovel for taking care of me, being patient and always following up.

originalText.text: Daniel is extremely knowledgeable and steered me in the right direction regarding my case.  He utilized his network to assist me with all of the questions I had throughout this process.
